## Complex table w/o colspan

<Table>
  <TableHeader>
    <TableRow>
      <TableHead>
        Item
      </TableHead>

      <TableHead>
        In Stock
      </TableHead>

      <TableHead>
        Price
      </TableHead>
    </TableRow>

  </TableHeader>

  <TableBody>
    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        Python Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        23.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        SQL Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        13.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        Codecademy Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        9.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

  </TableBody>
</Table>

## Complex table w/ colspan

<Table>
  <TableHeader>
    <TableRow>
      <TableHead>
        Item
      </TableHead>

      <TableHead>
        In Stock
      </TableHead>

      <TableHead>
        Price
      </TableHead>
    </TableRow>

  </TableHeader>

  <TableBody>
    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        Python Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        23.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        SQL Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        13.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        Codecademy Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell colSpan={2}>
        Not in stock
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

  </TableBody>
</Table>

## Complex table w/ rich content ( maybe out of scope? )

<Table>
  <TableHeader>
    <TableRow>
      <TableHead>
        Item
      </TableHead>

      <TableHead>
        In Stock
      </TableHead>

      <TableHead>
        Price
      </TableHead>
    </TableRow>

  </TableHeader>

  <TableBody>
    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        Python Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        * list element 1
          1. list element 3
          2. list element 4
        * list element 2
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        23.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        SQL Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        13.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

    <TableRow>
      <TableCell>
        Codecademy Hat
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        True
      </TableCell>

      <TableCell>
        9.99
      </TableCell>
    </TableRow>

  </TableBody>
</Table>
